  14. (**************************************************************************)

  16. (* Configuration for the boot compiler. The compiler should refuse to bootstrap
  17.    if configured with values which would contradict the configuration below.
  18.    The values below are picked to trigger errors if accidentally used in the
  19.    compiler (e.g. for the C compiler). *)

  21. ‌let boot_cannot_call s = "/ The boot compiler should not call " ^ s

  23. ‌let bindir = "/tmp"
  24. ‌let standard_library_default = "/tmp"
  25. ‌let ccomp_type = "n/a"
  26. ‌let c_compiler = boot_cannot_call "the C compiler"
  27. ‌let c_output_obj = ""
  28. ‌let c_has_debug_prefix_map = false
  29. ‌let as_has_debug_prefix_map = false
  30. ‌let ocamlc_cflags = ""
  31. ‌let ocamlc_cppflags = ""
  32. ‌let ocamlopt_cflags = ""
  33. ‌let ocamlopt_cppflags = ""
  34. ‌let bytecomp_c_libraries = ""
  35. ‌let bytecomp_c_compiler = ""
  36. ‌let native_c_compiler = c_compiler
  37. ‌let native_c_libraries = ""
  38. ‌let native_pack_linker = boot_cannot_call "the linker"
  39. ‌let default_rpath = ""
  40. ‌let mksharedlibrpath = ""
  41. ‌let ar = boot_cannot_call "ar"
  42. ‌let supports_shared_libraries = false
  43. ‌let native_dynlink = false
  44. ‌let mkdll = native_pack_linker
  45. ‌let mkexe = native_pack_linker
  46. ‌let mkmaindll = native_pack_linker
  47. ‌let flambda = false
  48. ‌let with_flambda_invariants = false
  49. ‌let with_cmm_invariants = false

  51. ‌let flat_float_array = true

  53. ‌let afl_instrument = false

  55. ‌let architecture = "none"
  56. ‌let model = "default"
  57. ‌let system = "unknown"
  58. ‌let asm = boot_cannot_call "the assembler"
  59. ‌let asm_cfi_supported = false
  60. ‌let with_frame_pointers = false
  61. ‌let reserved_header_bits = 0
  62. ‌let ext_exe = ".ex_The boot compiler should not be using Config.ext_exe"
  63. ‌let ext_obj = ".o_The boot compiler cannot process C objects"
  64. ‌let ext_asm = ".s_The boot compiler should not be using Config.ext_asm"
  65. ‌let ext_lib = ".a_The boot compiler cannot process C libraries"
  66. ‌let ext_dll = ".so_The boot compiler cannot load DLLs"
  67. ‌let host = "zinc-boot-ocaml"
  68. ‌let target = host
  69. ‌let systhread_supported = false
  70. ‌let flexdll_dirs = []
  71. ‌let ar_supports_response_files = true
